summary: MY 1999 CHRYSLER CONCORDE HAD A COMPLETE ENGINE FAILURE.  IT HAPPENED SUDDENLY & WITHOUT ANY WARNING LIGHTS.  I WAS STRANDED ON I-40 IN BUSY TRAFFIC.  THE DEALERSHIP SAYS THAT IT "SPUN A BEARING" & SHOWED ME SOME METALLIC GLITTER IN THE OIL. THE CAR NOW NEEDS A NEW ENGINE AT A COST OF APPROXIMATELY. $4500.00- 5000.00.  I HAVE A USELESS 1999 CONCORDE WITH ONLY 90K MILES & I STILL OWE $11.000.  IT HAD REGULAR MAINTENANCE PERFORMED.   *NLM
